original_text: The king and his seven officers are sending you with their authority. You have the law of your God that he has given to you. Go and see if your people in Judah and Jerusalem are obeying his law.
korean_text: 너는 네 손에 있는 네 하나님의 율법을 따라 유다와 예루살렘의 형편을 살피기 위하여 왕과 일곱 자문관의 보냄을 받았으니

sentences.original_text: The king and his seven officers are sending you
sentences.korean_translation: 왕과 그의 일곱 관원들이 당신을 보내고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: You have the law of your God
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 당신의 하나님의 율법을 가지고 있습니다

sentences.original_text: that he has given to you
if your people in Judah and Jerusalem
